item.title: Disable and Remove the ads in Yahoo! Messenger 9 or 10 beta
item.description: Yahoo! Messenger 9.0 is the current stable messenger version (Yahoo messenger 10 is in beta). As with any previous versions of Yahoo Messenger, there are various ads displayed in the bottom of the contacts list or inside message and chat windows. These ads can be disabled using a simple registry hack: Start regedit. (Run -> regedit.exe) Go to this registry key: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\YahoopagerLocale On the right you should see a Value called Enable Messenger Ad.
